description: This file provides environment helper functions for the frontend, specifically dealing with configuration variables such as API URLs, WebSocket URLs, environment modes, and feature flags. It reads environment variables tailored for a React application (CRA) and provides utility functions to access these configurations safely.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the configured API base URL, prioritizing REACT_APP_API_BASE and falling back to REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL, with whitespace trimmed and trailing slashes removed.

methods.name: getWsUrl()
methods.description: Returns the WebSocket URL if set in environment variables, with whitespace trimmed.

methods.name: getNodeEnv()
methods.description: Returns the React app environment or falls back to the Node environment, defaulting to 'development'.

methods.name: parseFeatureFlags()
methods.description: Parses feature flags from the environment variable REACT_APP_FEATURE_FLAGS, supporting JSON and CSV formats, and returns an object with feature flag names as keys and true as value.
